If you want a quiet place where you will not see anyone dressed in fishnets, thigh boots, or body piercings I would strongly suggest trying one of the other chains in Sunset Blvd west of Highland. If you want someplace that is inexpensive, but not stingy, close to Hollywood Blvd this is it.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting bed sheet and service staff was not willing to help”
Reviews.Author: serviceorientated
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Motel 6 in Sep07. After entered the room, immediately we found brown disgusting stains on the matress. They weren't even covered by the bed sheets. We also found disgusting stains on the carpet. Before unpacking we informed the receiption of the hotel. They were friendly, but unable to offer us an alternative room for the next two days. We gave Motel 6 Customer Relations a chance to refund part or full of the hotel rate. After explaining the insident twice (incl. local Management) they send us a standard apology letter. If a Hotel mess up a stay, at least their customer relations department should fix it. This is not the case with Motel 6 in Hollywood. I can not recommend to stay there, even the location is good. I have to add, you pay for parking, but the parking lot is always overbooked and a Motel 6 employee has to move cars around. Not a pleasent experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at the Motel 6”
Reviews.Author: Olivia055
Reviews.Content: I was really suprised at how good this Motel 6 was for the price....a perfect location right in the middle of Hollywood, and a spacious and clean room. After reading some reviews I almost went somewhere else, but it was way better than I was expecting! The staff were very friendly, I had a 10% discount coupon which wasn't actually valid anymore when I read the fine print...but the guy at the front desk still honoured it. I definitely recommend staying at this motel!

Reviews.Title: “Close to all the action”
Reviews.Author: superbagelms
Reviews.Content: We booked the hotel for a weekend stay with only 24 hours notice which was great for last minute planners. However the hotel smelled a little funny (the lobby, hallways and our room) and the air conditioner didn't work very well in our room. There was a short in the lights in the bathroom and they kept turning off while I was in the shower. The hotel has only limited parking but public parking is only 1.5 blocks away with a max rate of 8.00 a day which was great for such a popular place. This was our least favorite motel 6 we stayed at BUT!!!! It's only a few blocks from all the action in Hollywood with the stars, the Chineese Theater and the street performers.The short walk was a bonus for us since we spent the day at Universal Studios. The hotel staff were all very friendly and it was clean. Great bargain for the price and location.

Reviews.Title: “Welll....”
Reviews.Author: travelbugNYC
Reviews.Content: I have to preface this with my husband and I have been motel 6 goers for awhile now and after living in urban areas we aren't easily scared. I have to say this motel is a bit creepy. When we pulled up a cop car was there with an officer talking about DB this and 411 that. While like other motel 6 it has been partially renovated, nothing can help the area it is in. The area is quite run down with lots of vacent buildings. The rooms were not terrible, but I usually get better from motel 6. The staff was nice and if you want to park your car check in early because the garage fills up fast. The price was $68 including parking. Overall, I would be reluctant to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “One Step Above Cockroach heaven”
Reviews.Author: timboi
Reviews.Content: I arrived at the Hotel to be greeted by staff that looked like They were Hired from a Local Youth retreat. The Halls were very dirty and smelled of a very unpleasant order, and the rooms were not even worth the rate they charged.. I felt like I had checked into a Youth Hostile , and then to my suprise after checking out they had charged me and extra 40 for parking.... This hotel would rate below a 1 not to mention , a youth hostel would have been more enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Wrong with This Place!”
Reviews.Author: hedvigg
Reviews.Content: We stay here often when we go to LA. It is a no-frills, clean, good place to stay. The architecture of the apartment buildings around this hotel are beautiful. This probably was an apartment building at one time, converted to a hotel. We have never had any problems with the lobby, hookers, armed police officers, etc. any of the times we've stayed there. It's a great place to stay and walk to any Hollywood attraction nearby. We've walked this area many times late at night and it really isn't scarey..interesting, yes. Scarey, no. The room is always clean, bed comfortable, everything works fine. No shampoo/body lotion, but hey, it's not a 4 or 5 star hotel! I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Gigipingon
Reviews.Content: WHAT A DUMP! Not only was this place a complete dump, but I was SOOO scared of the area. We arrived late, so we had to do a late check-in, we had no idea where else to go, when we arrived in Hollywood. We had reserve the room for 2 nights, but one night was one night too many! The bedroom was totally gross, a tiny parking lot. You could hear the other guests in the room above you, the room on both sides of you and everyone walking down the hall. We did not complain about the noise, we decided to just to put up with it. Nor did we complain at 3:00 AM when our neighbors turn their TV on and woke us up. I dont think the TV was super high on the volume, it's the paper thin walls, that allowed all the noise in. **What happened next really creeped me out** We get a phone call about 8:00Am..........it was a hooker, asking if we needed some company. Since my husband picked up, she thought he might be by himself in the room. How nasty and gross, I told him, I don't care we lose our money for the following day, I just wanted out!! Very scary area to be in at night. Not much parking spaces. Do not go here!

Reviews.Title: “Hooker Hotel NASTY!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: OOOH Please do not stay here! I visited this hotel after visiting Magic Mountain. We stopped here for a night to check out Hollywood. The hotel was so creepy. Like old project housing. It definately would not survive an earthquake. There was NOTHING in our room, not even an alarm clock. The only thing that was there was a tv and a bar of soap. The bathroom was very nasty and filled with DIRT. It seems like a place to bring hookers...not for anyone to enjoy their stay at. The halls were musty and it felt like there were going to be bed bugs all over me. I stayed here with my husband and two kids. NOT a place for a family. Very seedy looking people staying at this hotel. There was only about 20 spots for parking and the rest was street parking or a parking lot two blocks away. Very unsafe area. STAY ANY WHERE ELSE BUT HERE!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good No-Frills Stay”
Reviews.Author: qbill
Reviews.Content: This hotel was an unexpected surprise. It was the cheapest hotel around so I was expecting a dump. But it was actually nice. The staff at check -in was friendly and helpful. The room was basic....we are talking Motel 6 here....but it was spotless and very quiet. The bed was comfortable, the bathroom was large, and the room's furniture all looked new. We were lucky to get parking in the small underground garage during the day, but at night, we had to park elsewhere. But the hotel did reimburse us for the parking fee in the near-by lot. The only thing bad I have to say is that the neighborhood is kind of dicey. Oh, and from the underground parking lot, you can take the elevator right up to your room with no security around. So, a possible unsafe situation there. Other than that, this is a good place to stay for a short visit. I would go back there again.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to Los Angeles standards!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I got a room at a very budget price, that was fine. But this room was very bare bones. There were no drawers to hold things, and the furniture in it was very scuffed and worn. (There wasn't even a phone book!!) My biggest problem was that there was _no_ parking at this place. There are over 150 rooms, and there were TWENTY PARKING SPOTS for motel guests. They told me to park 2 blocks away, pay to park, then walk back. There wasn't even an unloading spot at the curb out front, even at 2am!!! This place is fine if you don't need to deal with a car, and if you just need a place to sleep while doing something else, but it is _NOT_ a place to rest, recharge, or to take families while on a road trip.

Reviews.Title: “Was okay.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Motel 6 Hollywood for one night and for the price, it was good enough. We didn't have much trouble, except for the parking. We had to park 3 blocks away because the underground lot was full and we had to walk back thru Hollywood blvd late at night.

Reviews.Title: “No problems at all nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I don't agree with the other reviews..i had a good experience in motel 6 hollywood. stayed there for 2 nites....went to the hotel straight after a 10 hour flight from ireland and check-in was easy, reception staff were nice too. Didn't have any problems what so ever.....room was clean..nice hot water. The location is great...right in the center of everything, 2 mins walk to chinese mann etc.....best location you could wish for!! I'd recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Good deal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Location is great for the price and the place is not so seedy even if the room set-up was a bit depressing though.... we didn't meet any person from the priced-meeting-industry and staff was nice. Good deal for cheap stay in LA.

Reviews.Title: “Fair enough”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We were just spending one night in Hollywood, so decided to take the cheapest option. For backpackers this is an ok alternative because of a low price for a tight budget. The motel lobby was pretty dodgy, and we met some prostitutes in the hallways. The room was ok, not filthy, but still pretty dodgy. Still, we never felt unsafe or encountered any problems.The staff were pretty nice so I would say, for one night ok, but for longer, take another option. Sandy

Reviews.Title: “Ok, good position, no problems”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayedfor a couple of days summer 2003. Reasonably priced and in a good position. Under hotel parking useful

Reviews.Title: “Worst Lodging Experience Ever”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The "hotel" is filthy, noisy and otherwise OK. Each night I had to call the front desk because of the noise. Parties, hookers, you name it. The floors creak so each room is amplified into every other room. The walls are thin, if you are into listening in on what is going on, this is for you. This place basically ruined what was otherwise a great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Horror Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Its what happens when a good motel, goes bad. The hotel lobby had a armed police officer, and the noise level was that just short of a riot. the elevators did not work, there was no restaurant and our room was littered, a broken T.V. - a phone light that they could not shut off (we had to cover it with a towel)If your looking for a cleaner, safer, quieter, environment, sleep in your car.

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Los Angeles - Hollywood
HotelInfo.Address: 1738 North Whitley Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, CA 90028
